name: Pig Bigs' Big Dig
description:
Root up relics from the old boar civilisation to prove to your boss that they existed. Put the pieces together and display them at the museum!

Gameplay:
Walk around with WASD.
To the left of the screen you have a red bar, which will fill up when you get closer to an item buried in the ground. Press SPACE to start digging.
When digging, hold LMB to dig. Swiping left to right will unearth a small amount, but consume less stamina. Swiping up and down will unearth a lot of dirt, but use more stamina.
To the right you have the stamina bar. This depletes when digging. When it is empty you will go home to put the pieces you found together.
When home, use the mouse to put the pieces together on a grid to form an artifact. Every artifact consists of 3 pieces. Every completed artifact will award you points and will be displayed at the museum.
